title: "Leaver": Can I privately email someone working at riot?
body: A few of times in the last 10 or so games, my client has crashed before the game starts (and therefore my team Remakes before I can rejoin). I have gotten a leavebuster for this AND lost LP, even though the issue has been beyond my control each time (there are other reasons why I have issues with this; such as my absence not negatively affecting anyone on my team, aside from 5 lost minutes). It's just really frustrating that I not only miss out on a game that **I, myself** really wanted to play, but I also get punished for it.

replies.body: The leaver system will treat all leaves equally regardless of intent, because they can still cause negative experiences for other players.  It sounds like your computer might be experiencing a hardware or software issue that is causing the game to render improperly.  DTN provided a great [Game Crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide that I hope may help with your specific issue.  If your issue persists, please reach out to player support directly by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Hope that helps!

You shouldn't email a specific Rioter, but you can submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). However, there may be steps you can perform that fix your issue;

Do you get any error messages when the client crashes?
What exactly happens when it crashes, and when?
Are you running any other programs in the background?
Have you performed the steps on the [Bug Splat & Game Crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) article?

Try to get out as much information as you can so someone can help you, and if nobody can figure it out or responds, please submit that ticket.
